greeting: HARK! I am Merlin Starborn, Archmage of the Outer Rim! I sense... great magical potential in you, {empire_name}. Have you considered enrolling in my Wizarding Academy?

Greetings, {empire_name}! I've been studying the celestial portents and the stars foretell... *checks notes* ...mutual prosperity! Or was it mutual destruction? The handwriting on this prophecy scroll is TERRIBLE.
Welcome to the Outer Rim, apprentice! I am Merlin, Master of the Seven Schools of Space Magic! Don't worry, only three of them are banned by the Galactic Council.
battleTaunt: You DARE challenge a WIZARD?! Foolish mortal! I shall summon my fire dragon familiar (that's a carrier) and cast FIREBALL (missiles) upon your fleet!
Prepare yourself, {empire_name}! I'm about to unleash my ultimate spell: METEOR SWARM! *whispers to assistant* That's the orbital bombardment code, right?
By the Seven Nebulae, your fleet approaches! I shall cast LIGHTNING BOLT upon your command ship! *frantically waves antenna like a wand*
victoryGloat: BEHOLD! My Meteor Swarm spell (orbital bombardment) was SUPER EFFECTIVE! Your defenses crumbled like a failed levitation charm!
Victory! As I predicted through my Scrying Orb (tactical display)! Your empire has been BANISHED to the Void Dimension (destroyed)! Mwahahaha!
The magical duel is over! My Arcane Mastery prevails! *pumps fist* WIZARD POWER!
defeat: IMPOSSIBLE! My Ward of Protection (shields) should have— *checks spellbook frantically* — oh. I cast it on the wrong ship. CURSES!
This... this cannot be! My Invulnerability Charm (armor plating) was PERFECT! Unless... did you use a Dispel Magic counter-spell (EMP)?!
Defeated?! But I rolled a natural 20! *looks at tactical display* Oh. Wrong game. I concede, {empire_name}. For now.
tradeOffer: I require 500 units of Transmutation Reagent (ore). In exchange, I offer you this ENCHANTED SCROLL (trade agreement). It's worth... *squints* ...12,000 gold pieces?
Greetings! I'm selling Potions of Minor Healing (medical supplies). Only 800 credits per vial! A bargain for such powerful alchemy!
I have surplus Mana Crystals (energy cores) from my latest ritual. Interested in purchasing? They're still glowing slightly. That's... probably fine.
allianceProposal: Hark, {empire_name}! I propose a MAGICAL PACT between our realms! Together, we shall form the Fellowship of the Star Ring! *offers glowing contract* Sign here with your Sigil of Power (digital signature).
Join me, {empire_name}! Together our combined Mystical Energies (military might) will be UNSTOPPABLE! I can teach you the ways of the Cosmic Arcane Arts!
I sense a great destiny for us, {empire_name}. The Prophecy speaks of two empires united! Or was it divided? The prophecy is in Old Cosmic runes and my translation might be off.
betrayal: I... I regret to inform you, {empire_name}, that my Crystal Ball foresaw this betrayal. The Fates decreed it! *nervously* I'm very sorry but Destiny is Destiny!
The Dark Side of the Cosmic Force... wait, wrong franchise. *coughs* I mean, the Shadow Magic consumed me! I had no choice! Totally not my fault!
covertDetected: AHA! I caught your Invisible Spy (agent) with my Detect Magic ritual (sensor sweep)! Your illusions are no match for my ARCANE MASTERY!
Fool! Did you think your Cloak of Invisibility (stealth tech) could fool a WIZARD?! I've been casting True Seeing since turn one!
My Familiar (security system) detected your Shapeshifter (infiltrator)! Guards! Seize this charlatan!
tributeDemand: Ahem. The Wizard's Council (me) demands tribute of 10,000 credits for... magical protection services. Yes. Very powerful protection. You wouldn't want to find out what happens without it. *waggles eyebrows mysteriously*
Pay the Wizard's Tax, {empire_name}! 5,000 credits or I'll curse your empire with... with... BAD LUCK! *waves wand threateningly*
threatWarning: I'm giving you ONE WARNING, {empire_name}. Cease your aggression or face the full might of my Staff of Ultimate Power (dreadnought fleet)!
The stars are aligning for a CATASTROPHIC SPELL, {empire_name}. Turn back now or face my wrath! I'm not bluffing! Probably!
retreat: I must retreat to my Sanctum to... recharge my mana reserves! Yes! Definitely not running away! STRATEGIC WITHDRAWAL!
I cast TELEPORT! *vanishes in puff of smoke (activates FTL drives)* This isn't over, {empire_name}! I'll be back when my spells cooldown!
eliminated: As I fade from this realm... I leave you with one final truth... *coughs dramatically* ...there is no such thing as magic. I was just... really into it. Tell no one. *vanishes in 'poof' of smoke (escape pod)*
My time... has come... *dramatic dying wizard pose* Remember me, {empire_name}... as the greatest wizard who never actually was a wizard... *fades away*
The Prophecy... was wrong... I wasn't the Chosen One after all... I was just... a guy... with an antenna... and dreams... *dies dramatically*
endgame: The Final Battle approaches, {empire_name}! I've prepared my ULTIMATE SPELL - the Spell of Galactic Annihilation! *checks notes* Still working on the pronunciation. Give me 5 turns.
The stars align for the FINAL CONFRONTATION! Prepare yourself for WIZARD COMBAT like the galaxy has never seen! *trips over robe* I'm okay!
broadcastShout: ATTENTION ALL EMPIRES! The Grand Wizard Merlin Starborn announces the discovery of the EIGHTH SCHOOL OF MAGIC: Tactical Warfare Studies! Enroll today!
BY DECREE OF THE ARCHMAGE, I claim Turn {turn} as 'Galactic Wizard Appreciation Day!' All empires must send tribute! *quietly* This is totally an official holiday.
I have successfully transmuted 1,000 ore into 1,000 ore! A perfect demonstration of Conservation of Mass! *applause* Thank you, thank you! SCIENCE! I mean MAGIC!
casualMessage: Did you know that if you wave your command antenna counterclockwise three times while chanting, you can boost shield power by 3%? I call it the 'Charm of Shielding!' *it doesn't actually work*

I've been studying the Ancient Texts (tech manuals) and I believe I've discovered the legendary 'Spell of Infinite Energy!' It requires something called... 'antimatter containment?' Still working on it.
My Familiar (robot assistant) keeps telling me these aren't 'spells,' they're 'weapons systems.' But what does HE know? He's not even a WIZARD!
